# shortcut

**Instance Property**

The shortcut Siri invokes when the user speaks the invocation phrase.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var shortcut: INShortcut? { get set }
```

## Presenting Shortcut Editors

- **delegate**: The object that receives presentation requests from the button.
- **INUIAddVoiceShortcutButtonDelegate**: The protocol an object implements to receive notifications from the Siri Shortcut button.
